verses.verse: <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> all these <S%H1697>words,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> who <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>bondage.<s%>
"You shall have no <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> before <S%H6440>me.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H6213>make<s%> for yourselves an <S%H6459>idol,<s%> nor any image of anything <S%H834>that<s%> is in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H4605>above,<s%> or <S%H834>that<s%> is in the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H4325>beneath,<s%> or that is in the water under the <S%H776>earth:<s%>

you shall not bow yourself <S%H7812>down<s%> to <S%H5647>them,<s%> nor serve <S%H3068>them,<s%> for I, Yahweh your <S%H430>God,<s%> am a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H6485>visiting<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> on the <S%H1121>children,<s%> on the <S%H8029>third<s%> and on the <S%H7256>fourth<s%> generation of those who hate <S%H8130>me,<s%>
and <S%H6213>showing<s%> loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to <S%H505>thousands<s%> of those who <S%H157>love<s%> me and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H5375>take<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H7723>vain,<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will not hold him <S%H5352>guiltless<s%> who <S%H5375>takes<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> in <S%H7723>vain.<s%>
<S%H2142>"Remember<s%> the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> to keep it <S%H6942>holy.<s%>
You shall <S%H5647>labor<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> all your <S%H4399>work,<s%>

but the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is a <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%> You shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> any <S%H4399>work<s%> in <S%H1121>it,<s%> you, nor your son, nor your <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> your male <S%H5650>servant,<s%> nor your female <S%H519>servant,<s%> nor your <S%H929>livestock,<s%> nor your <S%H1616>stranger<s%> who is within your <S%H8179>gates;<s%>

for in <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and all that is in <S%H5117>them,<s%> and rested the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> therefore <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and made it <S%H6942>holy.<s%>

<S%H3513>"Honor<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%> and your <S%H517>mother,<s%> that your <S%H3117>days<s%> may be <S%H748>long<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> gives <S%H5414>you.<s%>
"You shall not <S%H7523>murder.<s%>
"You shall not commit <S%H5003>adultery.<s%>
"You shall not <S%H1589>steal.<s%>
"You shall not <S%H6030>give<s%> <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>testimony<s%> against your <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H2530>covet<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%> You shall not <S%H2530>covet<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H802>wife,<s%> nor his male <S%H5650>servant,<s%> nor his female <S%H519>servant,<s%> nor his <S%H7794>ox,<s%> nor his <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> nor anything that is your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s."

All the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>perceived<s%> the <S%H6963>thunderings,<s%> the <S%H3940>lightnings,<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H6226>smoking.<s%> When the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H5128>it,<s%> they trembled, and <S%H5975>stayed<s%> at a <S%H7350>distance.<s%>

They <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H1696>"Speak<s%> with us <S%H8085>yourself,<s%> and we will listen; but <S%H430>don't<s%> let God <S%H1696>speak<s%> with <S%H4191>us,<s%> lest we die."

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3372>"Don't<s%> be afraid, for <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5668>to<s%> <S%H5254>test<s%> <S%H3374>you,<s%> and that his fear may be before <S%H6440>you,<s%> that you <S%H2398>won't<s%> sin."
The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5975>stayed<s%> at a <S%H7350>distance,<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> drew <S%H5066>near<s%> to the thick <S%H6205>darkness<s%> where God <S%H430>was.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "This is what you shall <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H7200><s%> 'You yourselves have seen that I have <S%H1696>talked<s%> with you from <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
You shall most certainly not <S%H6213>make<s%> alongside of me <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> or <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for <S%H6213>yourselves.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H127>earth<s%> for <S%H2076>me,<s%> and shall sacrifice on it your burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and your peace <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> your <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and your <S%H1241>cattle.<s%> In every <S%H4725>place<s%> where I <S%H2142>record<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> I will <S%H935>come<s%> to you and I will bless <S%H1288>you.<s%>

If you <S%H6213>make<s%> me an <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H68>stone,<s%> you shall not <S%H1129>build<s%> it of cut <S%H68>stones;<s%> for if you lift <S%H5130>up<s%> your <S%H2719>tool<s%> on <S%H2490>it,<s%> you have polluted it.
Neither shall you go <S%H5927>up<s%> by <S%H4609>steps<s%> to my <S%H4196>altar,<s%> that your <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> may not be exposed to <S%H1540>it.<s%>'
